# Dwarf smooth-hound

| genus = Mustelus
| species = minicanis
| authority = Heemstra, 1997
| range_map = Mustelus minicanis distmap.png
}}
The dwarf smooth-hound (Mustelus minicanis) is a houndshark of the family Triakidae. It is found on the continental shelves of the tropical western central Atlantic, off the coast of South America between Cabo de la Vela, Colombia and Rio Caribe, Venezuela, at depths between . It can grow up to a length of . The reproduction of dwarf smooth-hounds is ovoviviparous.
